Text.Page:
The devas think they own this forest. I suppose they did before we got here, but that doesn't mean we let them keep it.

{@LinkCreature:3#20#Kulsilva}, his {@LinkCreature:3#300160#devan arcanists}, and their sporewalker pets are using some pretty dark magic to hold on to this place. I'd like to get a look at those amulets they wear, to see if they they hold a clue.

Are you willing to bring me back a few?
These will do nicely. I'll see if I can use these foci to disrupt their necromantic power. That would go a long way to restoring Oblivion Woods.
You'll find them lurking in Deva Silva.
